    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public CsvSerializerBuilder builder()
        Description copied from class: CoreObject
        Creates a new builder class for this object so that a new object can be created that expands upon the current object's settings.
        Overrides:
        builder in class Serializer
        Returns:
        A new builder.

      • create

        public static CsvSerializerBuilder create()
        Instantiates a new clean-slate CsvSerializerBuilder object.

        This is equivalent to simply calling new CsvSerializerBuilder().

        Note that this method creates a builder initialized to all default settings, whereas builder() copies the settings of the object called on.

        Returns:
        A new CsvSerializerBuilder object.

      • createSession

        public WriterSerializerSession createSession(SerializerSessionArgs args)
        Description copied from class: Serializer
        Create the session object used for actual serialization of objects.
        Specified by:
        createSession in class WriterSerializer
        Parameters:
        args - Runtime arguments. These specify session-level information such as locale and URI context. It also include session-level properties that override the properties defined on the bean and serializer contexts.
        Returns:
        The new session object.
